value.name: Suspect killed in Billings police standoff identified; woman charged with deliberate homicide
value.description: ... Department identified the suspect killed in the aftermath of a standoff with police Friday. Michael Lee McClure, 26, died during a firefight with officers after breaking into the garage of a ...

value.name: Montana Woman Pleads Not Guilty in Killing of Wyoming Man
value.description: A Billings, Montana, woman pleaded not guilty to deliberate homicide in the shooting death of a Wyoming man who refused to give her and her male companion cigarettes and a ride.

value.name: Full List of 229 Black People Killed by Police Since George Floyd's Murder
value.description: U.S. George Floyd Police Killings Police brutality Black Lives Matter At least 229 Black people have been killed by police officers across the U.S. in the year since George Floyd's murder.
